title: Auditing - Internal Security Scan
description: As part of a security audit project, an analyst needs to run an authenticated scan on internal servers to find vulnerabilities and missing patches.

tasks.description: Get temporary domain administrator credentials from the client to perform the authenticated scan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst has the necessary credentials.

tasks.description: Configure and run an internal vulnerability scan against the client's servers.
Analyze the results and generate a prioritized list of vulnerabilities to be remediated.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, actionable vulnerability report is created as part of the audit deliverable.
